text: Bangyou Zheng. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zheng B (2024). twrscripts: R Scripts Tiddlywiki. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/byzheng/twrscripts, https://byzheng.github.io/twrscripts/, https://twrscripts.bangyou./.
code: @Manual{,   title = {twrscripts: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki},   author = {Bangyou Zheng},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/byzheng/twrscripts, https://byzheng.github.io/twrscripts/},   url = {https://twrscripts.bangyou.me/}, }

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: R package twrscripts collections R Scripts Tiddlywiki manage authoring publications using multiple sources (ORCID, Scopus, Google Scholar, ResearcherID, homepage) reference list publications (crossref opencitations) following scenarios Tiddlywiki configured Node.js localhost authortication requirement. using TW-Refnotes manage reference Tiddlywiki using data structure . proper configurations API authortication multiple sources (e.g. ORCID, Scopus, ResearcherID).

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: Install developing version Github.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: Tiddlers tag Colleague refer person real life following fields used package. url personal webpage, assumption contain list publications. google-scholar personal profile Google Schole. orcid personal profile ORCID. researcherid personal profile Web Science ResearcherID. scopus author profile Scopus. Tiddlers tag bibtex-entry refer publication can imported wtih TW-Refnotes plugin following tags fields used package. tags colleague names authoring publication. field bibtex-doi DOI publication. DOI many functions identify publication field reference list references publication (Tiddlywiki. Data obtained crossref opencitations). field reference-count number reference field reference. field cited-count number publications cite publication.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: avoid redownloading data multiple resources (e.g. Google Scholar, ORCID, Web Science/ResearcherID, Scopus), retrieved data locally stored reused period. local folder configured option output default output working directory. data expried certain days (90 days default configured option file_expired). online API constrained daily request number, small number files removed call (3 default configured option file_remove_max). maximum number colleagues limited call option author_max (10 default) constrain request number WebAPI. run authoring daily schedule task, files gradually updated.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: authors publication searched multiple platforms (.e. Personal Webpage, Google Scholar, ORCID, ResearcherID Scopus) according related information.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: tiddlers tag Colleague, field scopus used author profile Scopus. R package rscopus used retrieve publication list colleague. See rscopus configure API Key Scopus.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: tiddlers tag Colleague, field orcid used author profile ORCID. R package rorcid used retrieve works ORCID. Package rorcid archived now alternative R package access ORCID API R. package use two system variables authenticate orcid (.e. ORCID_CLIENT_ID ORCID_CLIENT_SECRET).

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: tiddlers tag Colleague, field researcherid used author profile Web Scient. [WOS Starter API] (https://developer.clarivate.com/apis/wos-starter) used retrieve works Web Scient. package use environment variable authenticate WOS (.e. WOS_STARTER_KEY). R package rorcid used retrieve works ORCID. Package rorcid archived now alternative R package access ORCID API R. package use two system variables authenticate orcid (.e. ORCID_CLIENT_ID ORCID_CLIENT_SECRET).

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: R package scholar used retrieve works Google Scholar according google-scholarfield Tiddlywiki. Google Scholar provide DOI publications, publication matched according published year journal similar title. Consequently, matching might accurate.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: tiddlers tag Colleague, field url used author homepage. dois url assumed colleague’s publications.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: reference list publication obtained crossref R package rcrossref opencitations, added field reference Tiddlywiki. Two fields reference-count cited-count also updated number reference citation publication, respectively.

title: R Scripts for Tiddlywiki
text: Function works retrive works resources . Function reference get reference list. Function convert_pinyin convert tiddler Chinese title pinyin aka field. Function check_colleague check duplicate fields colleagues. Alternatively, batch job can created daily schedule (records) manully execution (new records). example R Script functions R script can saved file, e.g. tw_script.R. Windows, batch script can used schedule daily task (e.g. tw_script.bat).
code: args = commandArgs(trailingOnly=TRUE) #source("Rcode/function.R") message(Sys.time()) if (length(args) == 0) {     is_new <- TRUE } else {     is_new <- FALSE } twrscripts::tws_options(host = "http://127.0.0.1:8080/",                         output = "output") # Check colleagues tryCatch({     twrscripts::check_colleagues()     }, warning = function(w) {     warning(w)     stop("Duplicates in the colleague's fields.") })  system.time({     message("Update works for colleagues")     twrscripts::works(is_new = is_new)     message("Get reference list from crossref")     twrscripts::reference()     message("Convert title to pinyin")     twrscripts::convert_pinyin() }) Rscript.exe tw_script.R update 1>standard.out 2>standdar.err

title: Get works from ORCID using ORCID API. — works_orcid
text: R package `rorcid` used retrieve works ORCID according `orcid` field Tiddlywiki. Package `rorcid` archived now alternative R package access ORCID API R. package use two system variables authenticate orcid (.e. `ORCID_CLIENT_ID` `ORCID_CLIENT_SECRET`). retrieved works stored subfolder `orcid` output folder defined option `output`. works re-downloaded 90 days (modifying option file_expired) `is_new` equals `FALSE`
